about.text: We recognize a gap in the creative industry: Small businesses often struggle to find high-quality yet affordable technology solutions. That's why we exist.
about.paragraph: We offer a curated suite of technology services specifically designed for small business owners. From web design to software implementation, we simplify building a solid online presence at no additional cost.

solutions.span4: and drive your growth through ongoing

pricing.paragraph: Our pricing calculator provides a quick estimate to get you started, but your unique vision may involve specific needs that could adjust the final cost. Pricing here isn't fixed and will largely depend on the final scope of your project.

faq.q1: What services does Stellar Studio offer?
faq.a1: We offer complete solutions in Branding, Product Design, UX/UI Design, Front-end and Back-end Development. Our focus is transforming ideas into high-impact digital products.
faq.q2: How long does a typical project take?
faq.a2: The timeframe varies depending on the complexity, but typical projects last between 1 and 3 months, including planning, design, development and testing stages.
faq.q3: Is the price calculated by your online calculator final?
faq.a3: No. The calculator provides an initial estimate. The final value is determined after a detailed analysis of the scope, technical requirements, and resources involved.
faq.q4: Does Stellar Studio offer any payment plans?
faq.a4: We don't have fixed plans yet, but we can create customized proposals with payment terms adapted to the client's scope and budget.
faq.q5: What kind of support can I expect after launch?
faq.a5: We provide post-launch technical support and maintenance to ensure product stability, security, and proper functioning.
faq.q6: Does Stellar Studio outsource any work?
faq.a6: Yes. We work with a network of experts in various fields to ensure quality and efficiency at every stage of the project, whenever necessary.
faq.a7: Just contact us. We'll understand your needs, propose the best solution, and send you a personalized proposal to get the project started.
